h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 13
content: After defeating the Tiger's Acolyte in Yellow Sand Formation \- Windrest Hamlet, you will get the Old Rattle-Drum. You will need to complete this questline to then take on the Mad Tiger. Defeating the Mad-Tiger will give you another Blood of the Iron Bull.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 13'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the Tiger's Acolyte in Yellow Sand Formation \- Windrest Hamlet, you will get the Old Rattle-Drum. You will need to complete this questline to then take on the Mad Tiger. Defeating the Mad-Tiger will give you another Blood of the Iron Bull.
